attributes.action: Give parents the right to decide whats best for their chilren.
attributes.additional_details: Give parents the right to decide whats best for their children with regards to taking them on holiday during term time. Failing that, make changes preventing travel agents from charging extortionate prices during half term breaks, stop teachers from taking time off during term time.
